doc:
Gig Young https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gig_Young 0 Gig Young (born Byron Elsworth Barr; November 4, 1913 – October 19, 1978) was an American film, stage and television actor. He won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his performance in They Shoot Horses, Don't They? (1969). In 1978, he committed suicide, after murdering his wife. Gig_Young ( born Byron_Elsworth_Barr ; November_4_,_1913 – October_19_,_1978 ) was an_American_film_,_stage_and_television_actor . He won an_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actor for his_performance in They Shoot Horses , Do n't They ? (_1969_) . In 1978 , he committed suicide , after murdering his_wife .
